column5: Has anyone flown out of Armstrong? If so, what outfitter did you use and how was it?

have flown out of armstrong for years.mattice lake outfitters,armstrong air,trophy fish outposts,northern outposts...all are great outfitters and have a variety of lakes to choose from.have 2 weeks in june booked for 2003 and could use some fishermen to fill the camp.if this is of interest or you have more questions i would be glad to help in [email protected]

Whats the name of the Outfitter on Caribou Lake just north of Armstrong if you know, please?I used to hunt there back in the early 90's when it was Camp Caribou but Bill sold the place and I can't seem to find the new name...I wouldn't mind going back again sometime.Thanks,MachZ
The name of the camp on Caribou is now Forest Lodge.
Thanks for the come-back WW, much appreciated!
